issue.title: [Python] Remove the legacy ParquetDataset custom python-based implementation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15868](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15868). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We might want to keep the actual `ParquetDataset` class (ARROW-9720), but we should still remove the custom / legacy implementation (which is using the deprecated filesystem interface, so this is also blocking ARROW-15761)
